function to define a new token (tokenId should be unique) Only contract owner can call this function","params":{"name":"of the token ","numDecimals":"decimal precision for the token","tokenId":"of the new token ","ttfUrl":": external URL for this token's Token Taxononmy Framework (TTF) specification "}},"balanceOf(address,uint256)":{"details":"returns the balance of the account for the given token","params":{"account":": address for which balance to be checked","tokenId":": tokenId for the balance query Balance will be provided only for registered account"}},"balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[])":{"details":"Get the balance of multiple account/token pairs. If any of the query accounts is the zero account, this query will revert.","params":{"accounts":"The addresses of the token holders","ids":"IDs of the tokens"},"return":"Balances for each account and token id pair"},"burn(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"External function to burn an amount of a token for the given tokenId Only contract owner can call this function","params":{"amount":"of the token to be burnt","tokenId":"of the token to be burnt"}},"getAllTokenIds()":{"details":"returns ids of all tokens"},"getDecimals(uint256)":{"details":"returns the token decimals for the given token","params":{"tokenId":": token to check "}},"getTTF_URL(uint256)":{"details":"returns the TTF (Token Taxonomy Framework) token specs URL for the given token","params":{"tokenId":": token to check "}},"getTokenName(uint256)":{"details":"returns the token name for the given token","params":{"tokenId":": token to check "}},"isApprovedForAll(address,address)":{"params":{"account":"The account of the Tokens","operator":"Address of authorized operator"},"return":"True if the operator is approved, false if not"},"isDealerRegistered(address,uint256)":{"details":"returns true if Dealer's account is registered for the given token","params":{"account":": address of the dealer ","tokenId":": token for registration check Only contract owner can check for dealer registration"}},"isOwner()":{"details":"returns if the caller is the owner"},"isPaused(uint256)":{"details":"checks if the token is in pause state ","params":{"tokenId":": token to check "}},"mint(uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"External function to mint an amount of a token for the given tokenId Only contract owner can call this function This function can be called any number of times to add to the current total for a given tokenId","params":{"amount":"of the token to mint For ex: if one needs 100 full tokens, the caller  should set the amount as (100 * 10^4) = 1,000,000 (assuming the token's decimals is set to 4)","callbackData":": if smartcontract calling this function","tokenId":"of the token to mint"}},"pause(uint256)":{"details":"sets the token to the pause state to disable transfers, mints and burns","params":{"tokenId":": token to set in pause state Only contract owner can pause or resume tokens"}},"registerDealer(address,uint256)":{"details":"Only CBD (Owner or address(0)) can register Dealers","params":{"account":": address of the dealer to register","tokenId":": token for registration Only registered Dealers can transfer tokens "}},"resume(uint256)":{"details":"removes the token from the pause state to enable transfers, mints and burns","params":{"tokenId":": token to remove the pause state Only contract owner can pause or resume tokens"}},"safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)":{"details":"Transfers `values` amount(s) of `ids` from the `from` address to the `to` address specified. Caller must be approved to manage the tokens being transferred out of the `from` account. If `to` is a smart contract, will call `onERC1155BatchReceived` on `to` and act appropriately.","params":{"data":"Data forwarded to `onERC1155Received` if `to` is a contract receiver","from":"Source address","ids":"IDs of each token type","to":"Target address","values":"Transfer amounts per token type"}},"safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Transfers `value` amount of an `id` from the `from` address to the `to` address specified. Caller must be approved to manage the tokens being transferred out of the `from` account. If `to` is a smart contract, will call `onERC1155Received` on `to` and act appropriately.","params":{"data":"Data forwarded to `onERC1155Received` if `to` is a contract receiver","from":"Source address","id":"ID of the token type","to":"Target address","value":"Transfer amount"}},"setApprovalForAll(address,bool)":{"details":"Sets or unsets the approval of a given operator.     * An operator is allowed to transfer all tokens of the sender on their behalf.     * Because an account already has operator privileges for itself, this function will revert if the account attempts to set the approval status for itself.","params":{"approved":"representing the status of the approval to be set","operator":"address to set the approval"}},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"See {IERC165-supportsInterface}.     * Time complexity O(1), guaranteed to always use less than 30 000 gas."},"transfer(address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"transfers the value to the 'to' account for tokenId","params":{"to":": recipient address ","tokenId":": tokenId for the transfer","value":": amount of transfer Transfer can start only when both parties are registered and the token is not paused"}},"unregisterDealer(address,uint256)":{"details":"Only CBD (Owner or address(0)) can unregister Dealers","params":{"account":": address to be unregistered","tokenId":": tokenId for the transfer Only accounts with 0 balance can be unregistered "}}}},"userdoc":{"methods":{"isApprovedForAll(address,address)":{"notice":"Queries the approval status of an operator for a given addNewTokenDefinition(uint256,string,uin.details: External function to define a new token (tokenId should be unique) Only contract owner can call this function

params.name: of the token
params.ttfUrl: : external URL for this token's Token Taxononmy Framework (TTF) specification

balanceOf(address,uint256).details: returns the balance of the account for the given token

params.account: : address for which balance to be checked
params.tokenId: : tokenId for the balance query Balance will be provided only for registered account

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).details: Get the balance of multiple account/token pairs. If any of the query accounts is the zero account, this query will revert.

params.accounts: The addresses of the token holders

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).return: Balances for each account and token id pair

burn(uint256,uint256).details: External function to burn an amount of a token for the given tokenId Only contract owner can call this function

params.amount: of the token to be burnt
params.tokenId: of the token to be burnt

getDecimals(uint256).details: returns the token decimals for the given token

getTTF_URL(uint256).details: returns the TTF (Token Taxonomy Framework) token specs URL for the given token

getTokenName(uint256).details: returns the token name for the given token

isApprovedForAll(address,address).return: True if the operator is approved, false if not

isDealerRegistered(address,uint256).details: returns true if Dealer's account is registered for the given token

params.tokenId: : token for registration check Only contract owner can check for dealer registration

isOwner().details: returns if the caller is the owner

isPaused(uint256).details: checks if the token is in pause state

mint(uint256,uint256,bytes).details: External function to mint an amount of a token for the given tokenId Only contract owner can call this function This function can be called any number of times to add to the current total for a given tokenId

params.amount: of the token to mint For ex: if one needs 100 full tokens, the caller  should set the amount as (100 * 10^4) = 1,000,000 (assuming the token's decimals is set to 4)

pause(uint256).details: sets the token to the pause state to disable transfers, mints and burns

params.tokenId: : token to set in pause state Only contract owner can pause or resume tokens

registerDealer(address,uint256).details: Only CBD (Owner or address(0)) can register Dealers

params.account: : address of the dealer to register
params.tokenId: : token for registration Only registered Dealers can transfer tokens

resume(uint256).details: removes the token from the pause state to enable transfers, mints and burns

params.tokenId: : token to remove the pause state Only contract owner can pause or resume tokens

safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,ui.details: Transfers `values` amount(s) of `ids` from the `from` address to the `to` address specified. Caller must be approved to manage the tokens being transferred out of the `from` account. If `to` is a smart contract, will call `onERC1155BatchReceived` on `to` and act appropriately.

params.data: Data forwarded to `onERC1155Received` if `to` is a contract receiver

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.details: Transfers `value` amount of an `id` from the `from` address to the `to` address specified. Caller must be approved to manage the tokens being transferred out of the `from` account. If `to` is a smart contract, will call `onERC1155Received` on `to` and act appropriately.

params.data: Data forwarded to `onERC1155Received` if `to` is a contract receiver

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).details: Sets or unsets the approval of a given operator.     * An operator is allowed to transfer all tokens of the sender on their behalf.     * Because an account already has operator privileges for itself, this function will revert if the account attempts to set the approval status for itself.

params.approved: representing the status of the approval to be set

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: See {IERC165-supportsInterface}.     * Time complexity O(1), guaranteed to always use less than 30 000 gas.

transfer(address,uint256,uint256).details: transfers the value to the 'to' account for tokenId

params.value: : amount of transfer Transfer can start only when both parties are registered and the token is not paused

unregisterDealer(address,uint256).details: Only CBD (Owner or address(0)) can unregister Dealers

params.tokenId: : tokenId for the transfer Only accounts with 0 balance can be unregistered

isApprovedForAll(address,address).notice: Queries the approval status of an operator for a given account.
